description.p: Wildflower Belt was established in Dorset, UK, as a small independent family business and is built on a love of high quality leather accessories.

WildFlowerbelt.com is an online store that aims to provide quality over quantity, a trait unlike most online fashion shops which seem to offer an overwhelming choice of products and overbearing cross-sells. We value our business on providing a quality product with fast and reliable customer service.
Since starting trading in 2011 Wildflower Belt has grown from passion fueled weekend project to trusted and reputable online store.
We are so proud of our product that we have a 100% money back guarantee. If you don’t like the Wildflower Belt as much as we do we guarantee we’ll refund money immediately!
We would love to hear your feedback on our product, service, or business model. Please email us anytime at contact@wildflowerbelt.com
We are dedicated to you! Thanks for your support.
